channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Texas Supreme Court upholds state ban on gender transition treatment for minors
item.description: The Texas Supreme Court upheld the state's ban on gender transition treatment for children in an 8-1 decision after a lawsuit that argued the law harms transgender teenagers.

item.title: Trump says 'biggest problem' not Biden's age, 'decline,' but his policies in first appearance since debate
item.description: In his first rally following the debate, former President Trump told Virginia voters the "biggest problem" for the U.S. is not Biden's "decline" but his policies.

item.title: Cornell Law professor calls to invoke 25th Amendment after Biden's debate performance
item.description: After President Biden's weak debate performance Thursday night, Cornell Law Professor William Jacobson called for the 25th Amendment to be invoked.

item.title: WATCH: Dem. Rep. snatches phone in testy airport exchange over Biden's mental clarity: 'Who owns you?'
item.description: Democratic Rep. Marcy Kaptur got into a contentious exchange with a man at a Detroit airport who asked her about President Biden's cognitive abilities after Thursday's debate.
